summary: mptcp: Correctly set DATA_FIN timeout when number of retransmits is large
details:
mptcp: Correctly set DATA_FIN timeout when number of retransmits is large

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.27 by commit 0c3f34beb459753f9f80d0cc14c1b50ab615c631, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 6477dd39e62c3a67cfa368ddc127410b4ae424c6. For more details please see the references link.
